import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' class ExplRappJour extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { arrayPhotoAv: [], arrayPhotoApres: [], date:'', magasin: '', marchandiseur: '' } } componentDidMount() { if (JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))) != null) { var idRappJour = this.props.location.state.idRappJour; axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_magasin/GetRapportJourById.php?id=' + idRappJour).then(res => { this.setState({ arrayPhotoAv: res.data[0], arrayPhotoApres: res.data[1], date: res.data[0][0].date, magasin: res.data[0][0].magasin, marchandiseur: res.data[0][0].marchandiseur }) }) } else { document.location = '/' } } render() { return (

Rapport journalier

{/* /.col-lg-12 */}
{/* /.row */}
{this.state.arrayPhotoAv.map((el, index) => )}
Photo avant
{this.state.arrayPhotoApres.map((el, index) => )}
Photo Apres
); } } export default withRouter(ExplRappJour);
